t: Brand Stores: Create a brand page on Amazon for free | Amazon Ads

November 26, 2024 - Happy Belly is an Amazon private label that sells snack food items. It was introduced in 2016 and first include packaged nuts and granola mixes. In February 2019, the brand expanded to include milk delivery service.

t: It's Our Job to Shop: These Are the Amazon Brands to Keep on Your Radar
s: The Drop is an Amazon-exclusive brand that keeps its finger firmly on the pulse of what’s trending now. With a mix of beautiful basics and limited-edition, influencer-curated collections, this is the perfect place to refresh your seasonal wardrobe and score pieces you’ll return to repeatedly.

t: Amazon’s new 'Buy for Me' feature helps customers find and buy products from other brands’ sites
s: April 3, 2025 - New beta feature allows customers to use their Amazon Shopping app to complete purchases from other brand retailer websites if Amazon doesn’t sell the item directly.

t: Amazon's new shopping feature lets you search for products even if they're not sold on Amazon
s: February 11, 2025 - We’re experimenting with helping customers find products from other brands’ sites when they search in the Amazon Shopping app.
